# TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the transform to apply to the text.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TextTransform
```

## Text Transforms

- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform.none**: An option with no transform.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform.capitalized**: A transform for displaying the text with the first character capitalized.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform.lowercase**: A transform for displaying the text in all lowercase characters.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform.uppercase**: A transform for displaying the text in all uppercase characters.

## Customizing Content

- **font**: The font for the badge text.
- **color**: The color of the badge text.
- **backgroundColor**: The background tint color of the badge.
- **transform**: The transform to apply to the text before displaying it.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
